maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastuvlayerwrapper.cpp

#include "beastwrappers/beastuvlayerwrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

int BeastUVLayer::getUVArraySize() {
        int32 size = 0;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetUVLayerSize(m_obj, &size));
        return size;
}

int BeastUVLayer::getIndexArraySize() {
        int32 size = 0;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetUVLayerIndexSize(m_obj, &size));
        return size;
}

void BeastUVLayer::readUVArray(int start, int count, std::vector<ILBVec2>& uv) {
        uv.resize(count);
        BEAST_CALL(ILBReadUVLayerValues(m_obj, start, count, &uv[0]));
}

void BeastUVLayer::readUVIndexArray(int start, int count, std::vector<int>& uvIndex) {
        uvIndex.resize(count);
        BEAST_CALL(ILBReadUVLayerIndexValues(m_obj, start, count, &uvIndex[0]));
}

}
